welcome_message_body: Welcome to Parepare, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Parepare has to offer.

restaurants.name: D'Carlos Cafe & Resto
restaurants.description: D'Carlos Cafe & Resto is a restaurant located in Parepare.
restaurants.address: Jl. Bau Massepe, Parepare, Sulawesi Selatan 91121
